survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes, preferences, and barriers related to electric vehicle (EV) adoption to inform market strategies and policy recommendations.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) as your next car?

questions.question_text: What are the top three factors influencing your decision to purchase an EV?
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a limit of 3 choices. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with max selection of 3.

script.question_text: What are the top three factors influencing your decision to purchase an EV?

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you would pay for an EV compared to a similar gasoline-powered vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for standardized responses. Include 'Prefer not to answer' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with an optional 'Prefer not to answer'.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you would pay for an EV compared to a similar gasoline-powered vehicle?

questions.question_text: How concerned are you about the availability of public charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a follow-up open-ended question for specifics.

script.question_text: How concerned are you about the availability of public charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for NOT considering an EV at this time?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for NOT considering an EV at this time?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' to Q1

questions.question_text: How do you primarily charge your EV at home?
answer_options: I do not charge at home
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' to Q1 and own an EV
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for non-standard charging methods.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you primarily charge your EV at home?
answer_options: I do not charge at home
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Very likely' or 'Somewhat likely' to Q1 and own an EV

questions.question_text: What additional features would make an EV more appealing to you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What additional features would make an EV more appealing to you?

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with government incentives for EV purchases in your region?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to avoid neutral responses. Include a link to incentives if needed.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with government incentives for EV purchases in your region?

questions.question_text: Which of the following EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select. Randomize brand order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following EV brands are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your household income range?
questions.client_notes: Standard income brackets. Include 'Prefer not to answer' for privacy.

script.question_text: What is your household income range?
